languages.text: "Ты приш{mf|ел|ла} и смотрел{mf||а} на нас так, будто что-то понял{mf||а}. Но потом просто приказал{mf||а} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}отправить{/d} всех сервиторов исполнять их прежнюю работу. Говоря, что это — справедливость".

traits.locale_text: "Ты приш{mf|ел|ла} и смотрел{mf||а} на нас так, будто что-то поняла. Но потом просто приказал{mf||а} отправить всех сервиторов исполнять их прежнюю работу. Почему?"

languages.text: "You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}sent back{/d} to their work. You said it was just."
languages.original_text: "Ты приш{mf|ел|ла} и смотрел{mf||а} на нас так, будто что-то понял{mf||а}. Но потом просто приказал{mf||а} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}отправить{/d} всех сервиторов исполнять их прежнюю работу. Говоря, что это — справедливость".

traits.locale_text: "You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered to have all the servitors sent back to their work. You said it was just."
"You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered to have all the servitors sent back to their work. You said it was just."
"You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered to have all the servitors sent back to their work. You said it was just."
"You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered to have all the servitors sent back to their work. You said it was just."
"You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be sent back to their work. You said it was just."
"You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be sent back to their work. You said it was just."
"You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}sent back{/d} to their work. You said it was just."

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} et nous avez regardés comme si vous veniez de comprendre quelque chose, pourtant vous avez ordonné que tous les servitors {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}reprennent{/d} leur travail. Vous avez dit que c'était juste. »
languages.original_text: "You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}sent back{/d} to their work. You said it was just."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} et nous avez regardés comme si vous veniez de comprendre quelque chose, pourtant vous avez ordonné que tous les servitors reprennent leur travail. Vous avez dit que c'était juste. »

languages.text: “你走过来看了看我们，好像明白了什么。但随后，你下令让所有机仆{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}回去工作{/d}。你说这才是合适的处理方法。”
languages.original_text: "You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}sent back{/d} to their work. You said it was just."

traits.locale_text: “你走过来看了看我们，好像明白了什么。但随后，你下令让所有奴工回去工作。你说这才是合适的处理方法。”

languages.text: "Ihr seid gekommen und habt uns angesehen, als würdet Ihr etwas verstehen. Doch dann habt Ihr befohlen, dass alle Servitoren {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}wieder an die Arbeit gehen{/d} sollen. Ihr habt gesagt, es sei gerecht."
languages.original_text: "You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}sent back{/d} to their work. You said it was just."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid gekommen und habt uns angesehen, als würdet Ihr etwas verstehen. Doch dann habt Ihr befohlen, dass alle Servitoren wieder an die Arbeit gehen sollen. Ihr habt gesagt, es sei gerecht."

languages.text: «Has venido y nos has mirado como si hubieras entendido algo, pero luego pediste que todos los servidores {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}retomaran{/d} sus tareas. Dijiste que era lo justo».
languages.original_text: "You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}sent back{/d} to their work. You said it was just."

traits.locale_text: «Has venido y nos has mirado como si hubieras entendido algo. Pero luego pediste que todos los servidores retomaran sus tareas. Dijiste que era lo justo».

languages.text: 「あなたは目の前に現れ、何かを理解したように私たちを見ていた。しかしその後、あなたはすべてのサーヴィターを自分の仕事に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}戻るよう{/d}に命じた。それが正しいと言っていた」
languages.original_text: "You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}sent back{/d} to their work. You said it was just."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは目の前に現れ、何かを理解したように私たちを見ていた。しかしその後、あなたはすべてのサーヴィターを自分の仕事に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}戻るよう{/d}に命じた。それが正しいと言っていた」

languages.text: "Bir şeyler anlamış gibi gelip bize baktınız ama sonra tüm hizmetörlerin işlerine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}geri dönmesini{/d} emrettiniz. Adilane olan budur dediniz."
languages.original_text: "You came and looked at us like you understood something. But then you ordered that all the servitors be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsDuty}sent back{/d} to their work. You said it was just."

traits.locale_text: "Bir şeyler anlamış gibi gelip bize baktınız ama sonra tüm servitörlerin işlerine geri dönmesini emrettiniz. Adil olduğunu söylediniz."
